title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XX, pt. 710 - Procedures Of The Surrogate Decision-making Committee Of The New York State Justice Center For The Protection Of People With Special Needs
content:

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §45.07[j]; L. 1985, ch. 354; L. 2008, ch. 262

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
